# $Cov(T_1(X, Y), T_2(X, Y))$

```{R, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
sim_cov <- map(1:100, ~ {
  sim <- map(1:100, ~ {
    # Generate Data
    e <- mvrnorm(n, mu = c(0, 0), Sigma = S)
    ex <- e[, 1]
    ey <- e[, 2]
    X <- hx + ex
    Y <- hy + ey

    return(
      list(
        T1XY = Tk(X, Y, k = 1),
        T2XY = Tk(X, Y, k = 2)
      )
    )
  })

  # Get Covariance
  T1XY <- map_dbl(sim, "T1XY")
  T2XY <- map_dbl(sim, "T2XY")
  return(
    list(
      T1XY_T2XY = cov(T1XY, T2XY)
    )
  )
})
T1XY_T2XY <- map_dbl(sim_cov, "T1XY_T2XY") %>% conf_int()
```

```{R, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
# Evaluate Theory
cov_T1XY_T2XY_theory <- 4 * n * (sx^2 * sy^2 + sxy^2)
test_that("Variance", {
  expect_true(
    (T1XY_T2XY[1] < cov_T1XY_T2XY_theory) &
      (T1XY_T2XY[2] > cov_T1XY_T2XY_theory)
  )
})

# PASS:theory matches empirical simulations
# - scenario 5: pass
```
